column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: A traffic accident occurred at 3:00 am on November 20
column4: 2019 at Street 105 / corner of Street 432 in Toul Tompong 1
column6: Phnom Penh.------An LX570 accelerated over the crossroads without slowing down
column7: causing another car to crash into the divider and overturn.------Prior to the accident
column8: a blue Highlander  Phnom Penh 2BD 3208 was traveling along the 105 in a south-to-north direction
column13: but left behind a license plate on the road.------Authorities arrived at the scene and are now searching for the other vehicle. ------AREY NEWS
